name: chatgpt-browser-extension
description: ChatGPT Browser Extension with enhanced features

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp *.js dist/ && cp *.html dist/ && cp *.css dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.lint: eslint *.js src/**/*.js || echo 'No JS files to lint'
scripts.lint:fix: eslint *.js src/**/*.js --fix || echo 'No JS files to lint'
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../chatgpt-extension.zip .
scripts.package:store: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../chatgpt-extension-store.zip . -x '*.map'
scripts.validate: node -e "const m=require('./manifest.json'); console.log('âœ… Manifest valid:', m.name, 'v' + m.version)"
